<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1879158234</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Knowledge in Action, Save the World</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissen in der Tätigkeit, außer der Welt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La connaissance dans l'action, économiser le 
monde</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Conhecimento na ação, excepto o mundo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Conoscenza nell'azione, risparmi il mondo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γνώση στην ενέργεια, εκτός από τον κόσμο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Conocimiento en la acción, excepto el mundo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Materials showing how MIT faculty and students are working around the world to develop sustainable solutions to challenging problems.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Materialien, die zeigen, wie MIT Lehrkörper und 
Kursteilnehmer um die Welt arbeiten, um stützbare Lösungen zu 
schwierigen Problemen zu entwickeln.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Matériaux montrant comment le corps enseignant et
les étudiants de MIT travaillent autour du monde pour développer les
solutions soutenables aux problèmes provocants.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Materiais que mostram como a faculdade e os 
estudantes do MIT estão trabalhando em torno do mundo para 
desenvolver soluções sustainable aos problemas challenging.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Materiali che mostrano come la facoltà e gli 
allievi del MIT stanno lavorando intorno al mondo per sviluppare le 
soluzioni sostenibili ai problemi challenging.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υλικά που επιδεικνύουν πώς η σχολή MIT και οι 
σπουδαστές εργάζονται σε όλο τον κόσμο για να αναπτύξουν τις 
βιώσιμες λύσεις στην πρόκληση των προβλημάτων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Materiales que muestran cómo la facultad y los 
estudiantes del MIT están trabajando alrededor del mundo para 
desarrollar soluciones sostenibles a los problemas desafiadores.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
